Containers.Name: Booksonic
Containers.Description: Booksonic is a server and an app for streaming your audiobooks to any pc or android phone. Most of the functionality is also availiable on other platforms that have apps for subsonic.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/audiobooks[/b] This is the location where your audiobooks are stored.[br][br] [b]/var/config[/b] Where to store your config [br][br] [br][br] To access BookSonic, open the WebUI.[br][br]
Containers.Overview: Booksonic is a server and an app for streaming your audiobooks to any pc or android phone. Most of the functionality is also availiable on other platforms that have apps for subsonic.
